products.product_title: Maha PPC Cement, 50 Kg Bag

product_details.description_text:
Product Highlights
Premium Portland Pozzolana Cement:
Maha PPC Cement is an ideal choice for masonry and plastering works in Bangalore, offering excellent workability due to its finer particle size and pozzolanic additives like fly ash. This environmentally friendly cement generates less heat during curing, reducing the risk of cracks in Bangalore's varied climate. Compared to OPC, Maha PPC is more cost-effective while providing long-term strength that meets or exceeds traditional cement types.

products.product_title: Birla White Cement

product_details.description_text:
Product Highlights
Manufacturer:
Aditya Birla Ultratech
Premium White Portland Cement:
Birla White Cement, manufactured using advanced technology by Aditya Birla Ultratech, is the premier choice for decorative and structural construction projects in Bangalore. With superior fineness and exceptional whiteness (+89% Hunter scale), it delivers smooth, bright finishes ideal for mosaic tiles, terrazzo flooring, decorative plasters, and white cement-based products. The high refractive index and opacity ensure vibrant, long-lasting colors when used with pigments.

products.product_title: Roff T01 NCA Tile Adhesive, Grey, 30 Kg Bag

product_details.description_text:
Product Highlights
Single component
- Just add water, no additional mixing required
Perfect for
ceramic, terracotta, vitrified tiles, and natural stones
Suitable for both
interior floor and wall tiling
Water-resistant
and ideal for wet areas like bathrooms
Self-curing properties
- no additional curing needed
Polymer-modified
for superior bond strength and flexibility
Complies with IS 15477:2019
quality standards
üìè Quick Specifications
Use For:
New floor & wall tiling (interiors), wet areas, residential & commercial projects
Coverage:
Approximately 75-80 sq ft per 30 kg bag at 3mm thickness
Packaging Size:
30 Kg bag
Mix Ratio:
3-3.5 parts powder to 1 part water (5-6 litres water per 30kg bag)
Pot Life:
60-90 minutes working time
Open Time:
10-15 minutes for tile placement
Color:
Grey
Product Description
What is Roff T01 NCA Tile Adhesive?
Roff T01 NCA (New Construction Adhesive) is a
premium polymer-modified cement-based tile adhesive
specifically engineered for homeowners and contractors in Bangalore who want professional tiling results without the complexity. This advanced formula replaces traditional cement-sand methods, providing
superior bond strength, crack resistance, and waterproof performance
that's essential for India's monsoon climate.
üí° Why Homeowners Choose Roff T01
Beginner-friendly:
No measuring cement and sand - just add water
Monsoon-proof:
Water-resistant formula perfect for Bangalore's wet seasons
Cost-effective:
Eliminates wastage and reduces labor costs compared to traditional methods
No hollow tiles:
Even adhesive spread prevents the annoying hollow sound under tiles
Long working time:
60-90 minutes to place tiles without rushing
Versatile use:
Works on floors, walls, bathrooms, and kitchens
Technical Advantages for Long-lasting Results
Crack-resistant formula:
Prevents tile debonding and maintains structural integrity
Low shrinkage properties:
Minimizes gaps and maintains tight tile joints
Non-slip formulation:
Enhanced safety for bathroom and kitchen installations
Self-curing technology:
No need for additional water curing after installation
IS 15477:2019 compliant:
Meets Indian quality standards for Type 1 tile adhesives
Best Applications for Roff T01
‚úÖ Recommended For:
Ceramic tiles:
Standard wall and floor ceramics up to 300x300mm
Terracotta tiles:
Natural clay tiles for rustic designs
Vitrified tiles:
Low-porosity tiles for high-traffic areas
Natural stones:
Marble, granite (floor applications only)
Interior walls:
Plastered surfaces, cement boards
Interior floors:
Concrete, screed surfaces
Wet areas:
Bathrooms, utility areas (with proper waterproofing)
‚ùå Not Suitable For:
Gypsum plaster surfaces
Painted or metal surfaces
Exterior wall applications (without additives)
Large format tiles above 600x600mm
Tile-on-tile installations
Heavy natural stone cladding on walls
Step-by-Step Application Guide
üîß Easy Installation Process
Surface Preparation:
Clean substrate thoroughly, remove dust, grease, and loose particles. Dampen dry surfaces lightly.
Mixing:
Add 30kg powder to 5-6 litres clean water. Mix for 3-5 minutes until smooth paste forms.
Application:
Apply with notched trowel at 3-6mm thickness. Use 6mm notched trowel for best results.
Tile Placement:
Place tiles within 10-15 minutes of adhesive application. Press firmly with slight twisting motion.
Alignment:
Use tile spacers for consistent joints. Check alignment frequently.
Grouting:
Wait 24 hours before grouting. Clean excess adhesive from joints.
Coverage and Cost Calculator
Coverage per bag:
75-80 sq ft at 3mm thickness
For common room sizes:
10x10 ft room (100 sq ft):
1.25-1.5 bags required
10x12 ft room (120 sq ft):
1.5-2 bags required
Bathroom (40 sq ft):
0.5-1 bag required
üí∞ Cost Comparison
Traditional cement-sand method:
‚Çπ25-35 per sq ft (including materials and labor wastage)
Roff T01 method:
‚Çπ18-25 per sq ft (including reduced labor time and zero wastage)
Savings:
Up to 30% cost reduction with professional results
Storage and Safety Information
Storage:
Store in dry conditions away from moisture and direct sunlight. Keep bags off the ground on wooden pallets.
Shelf Life:
12 months in original sealed packaging
Safety:
Use gloves during mixing and application. Avoid inhaling dust. Keep away from children.
Frequently Asked Questions
Can I use this for outdoor tiles?
Roff T01 is designed for interior applications. For exterior use, consult with technical support or use Roff's exterior-grade adhesives.
How long before I can walk on the tiles?
Allow 24 hours before light foot traffic and 48 hours before heavy use. Full cure is achieved in 7 days.
What if I mix too much adhesive?
Mixed adhesive remains workable for 60-90 minutes. Only mix what you can use within this timeframe.
Returns & Exchange Policy
Return Within 24 Hours of delivery under the following conditions:
Damaged or defective product.
Wrong or missing product.
Product cannot be returned once used.
Refer to Refund Policy for details.

products.product_title: MYK Laticrete 305 Tile Adhesive, Grey, 30 Kg Bag

product_details.description_text:
Product Highlights
Premium MYK Laticrete quality
- trusted by professionals worldwide
Single component
- just add water, no complex mixing required
Perfect for
ceramic, vitrified, and small format natural stone tiles
Interior applications only
- floors and walls in dry areas
Polymer-modified formula
for superior bond strength and workability
Extended open time
- 20 minutes for precise tile placement
Multiple compliance standards:
ANSI A118.1T, EN 12004/ISO 13007: C1T, IS 15477:2019 Type 1T
Professional-grade performance
at economical pricing
üìè Technical Specifications
Use For:
Interior floor & wall tiling in dry areas - living rooms, bedrooms, kitchens (dry zones), commercial spaces
Coverage:
Approximately 75-80 sq ft per 30 kg bag at 3mm bed thickness
Mix Ratio:
5-6 litres clean water per 30kg bag
Open Time:
20 minutes working time for tile adjustment
Pot Life:
2-4 hours mixed adhesive usability
Bed Thickness:
Up to 12mm maximum application thickness
Packaging Size:
30 Kg bag
Color:
Grey
Product Description
What Makes MYK Laticrete 305 Special?
MYK Laticrete 305 (LATAFIX 305) represents the perfect balance of
premium international quality and economical pricing
for Bangalore homeowners. As part of the globally trusted Laticrete family - used in prestigious projects worldwide - this polymer-modified, cement-based tile adhesive delivers
superior bond strength, exceptional workability, and consistent quality
that both contractors and DIY homeowners depend on for long-lasting results.
üèÜ Why Homeowners Prefer Laticrete Over Standard Brands
International quality assurance:
Meets ANSI, EN/ISO, and Indian IS 15477 specifications simultaneously
Extended working time:
20-minute open time vs 10-15 minutes in standard adhesives - perfect for DIY installations
Superior workability:
Smooth, creamy consistency that spreads effortlessly without lumps
Proven durability:
Used in commercial projects, hotels, and premium residential installations across India
Premium at economy price:
International brand performance without the premium pricing
Contractor recommended:
First choice of professional tilers for guaranteed results
Perfect Applications for MYK Laticrete 305
‚úÖ Ideal For These Areas:
Living rooms:
Ceramic and vitrified tiles up to 600x600mm
Bedrooms:
All types of ceramic tiles and small format natural stones
Kitchen dry areas:
Counter surfaces, backsplash areas away from sink
Commercial spaces:
Shops, offices, showrooms with interior applications
Dining areas:
High-traffic ceramic and vitrified tile installations
Study rooms:
Natural stone tiles like marble, granite (small formats)
‚ùå Not Recommended For:
Wet areas like bathrooms, shower areas (use Laticrete 325 High Flex instead)
Exterior walls or outdoor applications
Large format tiles above 600x600mm
Swimming pools or constantly submerged areas
Over painted surfaces or metal substrates
Green marble or water-sensitive natural stones
Technical Superiority Over Standard Adhesives
Superior bond strength:
Exceeds 200 PSI shear strength (standard adhesives: 150-180 PSI)
Low shrinkage technology:
Minimizes cracking and tile debonding over time
Polymer-modified formula:
Enhanced flexibility accommodates structural movements
Multiple substrate compatibility:
Bonds effectively to concrete, cement plaster, brick masonry, and terrazzo
Underfloor heating compatible:
Withstands thermal stress without bond failure
Extended pot life:
2-4 hours working time vs 60-90 minutes in standard products
Professional Installation Guide
üîß Step-by-Step Application
Surface Preparation:
Ensure substrate is clean, sound, and free from dust, oil, or loose materials. Dampen lightly if too dry.
Mixing:
Add 30kg powder to 5-6 litres clean water. Mix for 3-5 minutes to smooth, lump-free consistency. Allow 5 minutes slaking time.
Application:
Apply with 6mm x 6mm notched trowel at 3-6mm thickness. Work in sections that can be tiled within 20 minutes.
Tile Placement:
Place tiles within 20 minutes of adhesive application. Press firmly with slight twisting motion for full bedding.
Back Buttering:
For tiles larger than 300x300mm, apply adhesive to tile back for 100% coverage.
Alignment & Cleaning:
Use spacers for consistent joints. Clean excess adhesive immediately with damp cloth.
Curing:
Wait 24-36 hours before grouting. Allow 48-72 hours before heavy traffic.
Coverage and Cost Analysis
üìä Coverage Calculator
Per 30kg bag:
75-80 sq ft at 3mm thickness
Common room coverage:
10x10 ft bedroom (100 sq ft):
1.25-1.5 bags
12x12 ft living room (144 sq ft):
1.8-2 bags
10x12 ft kitchen dry area (120 sq ft):
1.5-2 bags
200 sq ft showroom:
2.5-3 bags
Suitable Substrates and Surface Preparation
Compatible surfaces:
Concrete, cement mortar beds, cement plaster, brick masonry, cement terrazzo, existing ceramic/vitrified tiles (after proper surface preparation)
üèóÔ∏è Surface Requirements
New concrete:
Must be 28 days old and properly cured
Plaster surfaces:
Allow 7 days curing before tile application
Existing tiles:
Clean thoroughly and roughen surface for better adhesion
Temperature range:
Surface temperature between 4¬∞C to 40¬∞C during application
Quality Certifications and Standards
ANSI A118.1T:
American National Standards Institute compliance
EN 12004/ISO 13007: C1T:
European standard for improved tile adhesives
IS 15477:2019 Type 1T:
Indian standard for Type 1 tile adhesives with improved characteristics
VOC content:
Practically nil - safe for indoor air quality
Storage and Safety Guidelines
Storage Instructions:
Store in dry conditions off the ground, away from moisture and direct sunlight. Use wooden pallets to prevent ground moisture absorption.
Shelf Life:
12 months in unopened original packaging under proper storage conditions
Safety Precautions:
Use protective gloves during mixing and application. Avoid inhaling dust particles. Ensure adequate ventilation. Keep away from children.
Frequently Asked Questions
Can I use this for bathroom tiles?
No, MYK Laticrete 305 is designed for dry interior areas only. For bathrooms, use MYK Laticrete 325 High Flex which offers water resistance.
What's the difference between 305 and regular tile adhesives?
Laticrete 305 offers superior polymer modification, longer open time (20 vs 10-15 minutes), higher bond strength, and meets international quality standards.
Can I install large format tiles with this?
For tiles larger than 600x600mm, use MYK Laticrete 325 High Flex or 335 Super Flex for better support and flexibility.
How long before I can grout?
Wait 24-36 hours before grouting at normal temperatures (25¬∞C). In cooler conditions, allow additional curing time.
Returns & Exchange Policy
Return Within 24 Hours of delivery under the following conditions:
Damaged or defective product.
Wrong or missing product.
Product cannot be returned once used.
Refer to Refund Policy for details.

Product Description
Roff T04 VFA White Tile Adhesive
is a premium polymer-modified, low VOC tile adhesive engineered specifically for fixing ceramic, vitrified tiles, glass mosaic tiles, glass tiles of various sizes, semi-vitreous tiles, and natural stones. The white formulation is particularly suited for applications where shadow marks must be avoided on light-colored or transparent tiles.
What Makes Roff T04 VFA White Special?
White Adhesive Advantage:
Unlike grey adhesives that create visible shadow marks on light-colored tiles, Roff T04 VFA White provides a clean, professional finish on glass tiles, light marble, white ceramic tiles, and light porcelain applications. This makes it the preferred choice for modern, minimalist interior designs where aesthetics matter.
Polymer-Modified Formula:
The polymer modification enhances bond strength and flexibility, accommodating slight substrate movement and tile expansion during temperature changes‚Äîcritical in Bangalore's climate with varying humidity levels (50-90% depending on season).
Versatile Application:
Suitable for both internal floor and wall applications, Roff T04 VFA White works excellently on:
Kitchen Backsplash:
White adhesive maintains clean appearance behind transparent or light glass tiles without shadow visibility
Bathroom Walls:
Handles moisture and humidity while keeping walls looking polished with white grout and light tiles
Living Room Feature Walls:
Large transparent or light-colored tiles with premium appearance
Marble Applications:
Natural stone installations benefit from white adhesive preventing color transfer issues
Glass Tile Installations:
Transparent glass tiles show adhesive color prominently‚Äîwhite eliminates dark visibility
Performance in Bangalore Climate
Bangalore's humid environment, with 75-85% humidity during monsoon (June-September) and 50-65% during dry months, demands adhesives with superior water resistance. Roff T04 VFA White's polymer-modified composition ensures:
Moisture Resistance:
Maintains adhesive integrity even in high-humidity bathrooms and kitchens
Extended Drying Time:
In Bangalore's monsoon, expect 24-36 hours for initial set (vs 18-24 hours in summer)
Long-term Durability:
Polymer properties prevent adhesive degradation in wet areas
Non-Slip Performance:
Maintains hold on vertical surfaces even during humid seasons
Technical Specifications
Adhesive Type:
Polymer-modified thin-set cement-based adhesive
Color:
White (prevents shadow marks on light tiles)
Bag Size:
20 kg powder
Coverage Rate:
5-6 sq meters per 20kg bag (at 3mm thickness with 6mm x 6mm notch trowel)
Mixing Ratio:
Approximately 1 bag (20kg) adhesive to 5-6 litres of water (adjust for desired consistency)
Open Time:
30-45 minutes (varies with temperature and humidity‚Äîshorter in hot/dry conditions)
Initial Set:
12-24 hours in summer, 24-36 hours in monsoon (Bangalore)
Full Cure:
48-72 hours before water exposure in wet areas
Application Temperature:
5¬∞C to 40¬∞C (typical for Bangalore year-round)
Tile Types Compatible:
Ceramic, porcelain, vitrified, glass, semi-vitreous tiles, natural stone
Substrate Types:
Concrete, cement mortar, brick, existing tiles (tile-on-tile)
Water Resistance:
High - maintains bond at 95%+ humidity
Flexibility:

VOC Compliance:

Ideal Applications for Roff T04 VFA White
Kitchen Backsplash Tiling:
Kitchen humidity reaches 75-85% during cooking. Roff T04 VFA White's polymer-modified formula bonds kitchen tiles securely while its white color maintains aesthetic appeal behind glass or light ceramic backsplash tiles. Unlike grey adhesive that shows through transparent tiles, white adhesive creates seamless appearance.
Bathroom Wall Tiling:
Bathrooms experience 80-95% humidity after showers. Roff T04 VFA White prevents moisture penetration, maintaining tile bond integrity. White formulation works perfectly with light-colored bathroom wall tiles and marble applications.
Glass Tile Installation:
Transparent glass tiles reveal adhesive color prominently. Roff T04 VFA White ensures tiles don't show dark adhesive shadow marks, creating professional appearance in feature walls and decorative applications.
Light Marble & Stone:
Natural light stone and marble tiles benefit from white adhesive preventing color bleed and maintaining pristine appearance. Polymer modification ensures stone doesn't slip during installation.
Tile-on-Tile Renovation:
Renovating bathrooms or kitchens? Roff T04 VFA White's strong bond adheres new light-colored tiles directly over existing tiles without breaking them, ideal for Bangalore home renovations.

Application Tips for Best Results
Surface Preparation (Critical Step):
Remove all dust, loose mortar, paint, and algae from surface
Make surface damp (not wet) 15 minutes before application for better adhesion
Ensure surface is rough‚Äîsmooth surfaces reduce bond; roughen if needed
Fill gaps exceeding 10mm with cement mortar first
Level surface using leveling guides for consistent adhesive thickness
Mixing Guidelines:
Ratio: 1 part Roff T04 VFA White (20kg) to 5-6 litres of clean water
Consistency: Achieve peanut butter-like texture (not too thick, not watery)
Mix thoroughly using electric drill with paddle for 2-3 minutes
Rest mixed adhesive 10 minutes before application (improves workability)
Retemper only with water if mixture dries out; avoid full re-mixing
Don't mix more than needed‚Äîuse within adhesive's open time
Application Technique:
Use 6mm x 6mm notch trowel held at 45¬∞ angle for consistent ridges
Achieve 80-90% coverage on tile back (visible when placed)
Press tiles firmly to eliminate air pockets and ensure full contact
Work within open time (30-45 minutes) before surface dries
For vertical surfaces: use thicker consistency to prevent tile slippage
Check tile levelness every 4-5 tiles during installation

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)
Q1: When should I use white adhesive (T04) vs grey adhesive (T03)?
A:
Use Roff T04 VFA White for light-colored tiles, glass tiles, marble, and white ceramics to avoid shadow marks. Use grey (T03) for dark/medium colored tiles or when cost is primary concern. Both have identical water resistance and bonding strength‚Äîthe difference is aesthetic. For premium backsplash or visible glass tile installations, white is worth the ‚Çπ87 price difference.
Q2: Is Roff T04 VFA White suitable for bathrooms in Bangalore?
A:
Yes, absolutely. Bangalore bathrooms experience 80-95% humidity, especially after showers. Roff T04 VFA White's polymer-modified composition maintains adhesive integrity in high moisture. Extend drying time by 8-12 hours during monsoon season (June-September). Ensure proper ventilation to accelerate curing.
Q3: How much white adhesive do I need for my kitchen backsplash?
A:
Kitchen backsplash typically covers 5-15 sq meters. With 5-6 sq meter coverage per 20kg bag, a typical 10 sqm backsplash needs 1.7-2 bags. For precise calculation: (Project area √∑ 5.5 sq meters coverage) √ó 20kg per bag. Add 10% extra for waste. Example: 10 sq meters √∑ 5.5 = 1.82 bags, round up to 2 bags (40kg total).
Q4: Can I use T04 White on large format tiles (600mm+)?
A:
Roff T04 VFA White works for standard size tiles up to 300-400mm. For large format tiles (600mm+), Roff recommends Roff T20 Extrofix Ultra which offers superior bond strength, extended open time (2 hours), and flexibility needed for large tiles. Large tiles' weight demands T20's premium performance.
Q5: How long before I can grout after applying Roff T04 VFA White?
A:
Minimum 24 hours in summer (March-May), 36 hours in monsoon (June-September). In Bangalore's humid climate, extending to 48 hours is safer, especially in monsoon. Touch-test: adhesive should not dent with thumb pressure. Never grout until adhesive fully sets.
Q6: What's the shelf life of Roff T04 VFA White powder?
A:
Unopened bags: 12 months in cool, dry storage. Opened bags: use within 2-3 weeks if stored in sealed bags. Bangalore's high humidity can cause powder to absorb moisture, affecting mixing quality. Store in well-ventilated, moisture-controlled area. Never store in bathrooms or damp areas.
Q7: Is Roff T04 VFA White better than MYK Laticrete for white tile applications?
A:
Both are quality products. Roff T04 VFA White is locally established with proven Bangalore performance and 24-hour HomeRun delivery. Choice depends on availability and preference. For light-colored tiles specifically, white formulation ensures no shadow marks regardless of brand.
Q8: Can I mix Roff T04 VFA White with other adhesives?
A:
No. Never mix different adhesive brands or types. Each formula has unique polymer composition and curing properties. Mixing can compromise bond strength and durability. If you need to switch adhesives mid-project, allow first adhesive to fully cure (48 hours), then prepare surface before applying new adhesive.
Q9: Does Roff T04 VFA White contain harmful chemicals or VOCs?
A:
Roff T04 VFA White is low VOC (volatile organic compounds) formulated, making it safer for indoor bathroom and kitchen applications. It's free from heavy metals and contains no asbestos. Suitable for residential and commercial applications. Ensure proper ventilation during mixing and application as good practice.
Q10: What's the cost-benefit of Roff T04 VFA White at ‚Çπ672 vs T03 VFA Grey at ‚Çπ585?
A:
The ‚Çπ87 per bag premium for white adhesive is worth it for visible installations (kitchen backsplash, bathroom walls with light tiles, glass tile features). For non-visible areas or dark tiles, grey is sufficient. For a 20-bag project, the premium is ‚Çπ1,740 total‚Äîminimal cost for professional appearance on premium tile investments.

Product Description
What Makes T20 Extrofix Ultra Special
Roff T20 Extrofix Ultra Adhesive is a
high polymer-modified, highly flexible tile adhesive
engineered specifically for premium applications involving large format tiles, natural stones, and decorative elements. Unlike standard adhesives, T20 combines superior slip resistance with extended open time and excellent bond strength‚Äîmaking it the professional choice for demanding installations.
The white formulation is particularly advantageous for light-colored and transparent tiles, as it prevents the shadow marks and discoloration that can occur with grey adhesives. This makes T20 the preferred option for marble cladding, glass tile installations, and high-end residential projects where aesthetics matter.
Polymer-Modified Formula for Premium Performance
The advanced polymer modification in Roff T20 delivers several key advantages:
Increased Flexibility:
The polymer additives allow the adhesive to accommodate substrate movement, thermal expansion, and contraction without cracking or losing bond
Superior Adhesion:
Enhanced bonding properties ensure secure attachment to challenging surfaces including existing tiles, stone, and concrete
Water Resistance:

Extended Workability:

Ideal Applications for Large Format Installations
1. Marble & Natural Stone Cladding:
T20 is specifically formulated for marble slabs, limestone, granite, and travertine where flexibility and bond strength are critical. The white color prevents visibility of the adhesive through semi-translucent stones.
2. Glass Tile & Mosaic Applications:
Perfect for decorative glass tiles, glass mosaic, and glass block installations where the white adhesive ensures a clean, professional appearance without color bleeding through.
3. Large Format Ceramic & Vitrified Tiles:
Ideal for 60cm√ó60cm tiles, 80cm√ó80cm slabs, and larger ceramic or porcelain tiles on both walls and floors. The extended open time accommodates larger surface areas without adhesive skinning over.
4. Slim Panel & Cladding Systems:
T20 provides excellent performance with lightweight cladding panels and thin stone veneers, handling the stresses of weight and movement without premature failure.
5. External Facades & Commercial Projects:
Engineered for outdoor use, including balconies, terraces, external cladding, and commercial flooring where durability under sun exposure and temperature fluctuations is essential.
6. Tile-on-Tile Applications:
When installing new tiles over existing tile surfaces (common in renovations), T20's strong polymer-modified bond ensures adhesion to non-porous substrates.
Bangalore Climate Performance
In Bangalore's warm, humid climate, T20 performs exceptionally well:
Monsoon Season (June-September):
Higher humidity (70-90%) requires 24-36 hours full curing time. Allow extended drying between grouting and water exposure.
Summer Performance:
Fast surface drying in heat (March-May) makes T20 ideal, but ensure substrate is not overly porous to prevent moisture loss. Water the substrate lightly before application.
Humidity Management:
White adhesive's water-resistant polymer modification prevents moisture penetration and mold growth in bathrooms and kitchens typical of Bangalore homes.
Temperature Stability:
Polymer flexibility accommodates Bangalore's daily temperature variations (15-35¬∞C), preventing adhesive cracking.

Professional Application Tips
Surface Preparation:
Clean substrate thoroughly; remove dust, loose plaster, grease, and algae
Ensure substrate is structurally sound and not excessively porous
For porous surfaces (plaster, concrete), dampen lightly before application to prevent premature water loss
Existing tiles must be mechanically roughened or primed for optimal adhesion
Mixing:

Achieve a thick, creamy consistency that spreads without sagging on vertical surfaces
Prepare only the amount you can use within 30-40 minutes (open time)
Trowel Application:
Use 6mm √ó 6mm notch trowel for large format tiles (60cm and above)
Apply toothed side at 45¬∞ angle for consistent ridging and full coverage
Aim for 80-90% coverage on tile back; achieve 100% coverage on substrate
Replace trowel lines with a new application if adhesive begins to skin over
Tile Placement:
Press firmly and twist tiles to set them in place; don't slide tiles on adhesive (breaks bond)
Use spacers (2-3mm) to maintain uniform joint widths for professional appearance
Check alignment frequently with a level; T20's extended open time allows corrections within 30-40 minutes
For heavy marble/stone, use additional support (props, boards) to prevent tile slippage

Frequently Asked Questions
1. When should I use T20 instead of standard grey adhesives like T03?
Use T20 for any visible light-colored tiles (white, cream, beige, light grey) or transparent materials (glass, marble). The white color prevents shadow marks and discoloration that compromise aesthetic appeal. T20 is also superior for large format tiles due to extended open time and flexibility. For standard grey ceramic tiles in utility areas, T03 is more economical.
2. What's the difference between T20 Extrofix Ultra and T04 Vitro Fix?
T20 (Extrofix Ultra):
High polymer-modified, extended open time (30-40 mins), best for large format tiles, marble, natural stones, outdoor use, and demanding applications. Price: ‚Çπ1,265/bag.
T04 (Vitro Fix):
Low POC formula, best for small-to-medium glass tiles, vitrified tiles, light internal use. Shorter open time. Price: ‚Çπ672/bag. Choose T04 for budget-conscious glass tile projects; T20 for premium marble, outdoor, or large slab installations.
3. Can I use T20 for tile-on-tile applications?
Yes. T20's polymer-modified formula has excellent adhesion to non-porous tile surfaces. Ensure existing tiles are clean and mechanically roughened (use sandpaper or wire brush). This is common during bathroom/kitchen renovations in Bangalore homes.
4. How does humidity affect T20 curing in Bangalore?
High humidity (70-90% during monsoon) significantly extends curing times. Plan for 30-36 hours initial set instead of 6-8 hours. Wait 72 hours before grouting. Ensure good ventilation and avoid exposing tiles to water for 10-14 days during monsoon. Polymer modification helps resist moisture infiltration, but full strength requires adequate drying time.
5. What coverage should I expect from a 20kg bag?
Approximately 5-6 m¬≤ at 3mm bed thickness using a 6mm √ó 6mm notch trowel. Large format tiles (60cm+) and marble slabs may require slightly thicker beds (3.5-4mm), reducing coverage to 4-5 m¬≤. Always account for substrate irregularities and tile size variations.
6. Is T20 suitable for swimming pools and water features?
Yes. T20's water-resistant polymer modification makes it excellent for pools, fountains, saunas, and spas. However, for specialized pool applications, consider dedicated pool adhesives or epoxy-based options for even greater chemical resistance. T20 is suitable for standard residential pool tiling.
7. Can I use T20 on exterior balconies and terraces in Bangalore?
Absolutely. T20 Extrofix Ultra is specifically engineered for external cladding, balconies, and terraces. Its flexibility accommodates thermal expansion/contraction from Bangalore's temperature variations (15-35¬∞C). The white color is also aesthetically superior for exterior applications. Ensure proper substrate preparation and curing time before exposing to monsoon rains.
8. What's the water-to-adhesive mixing ratio?
Approximately 1:0.25-0.30 (1kg adhesive to 250-300ml water). Adjust based on desired consistency‚Äîthicker for vertical surfaces, slightly thinner for floors. Mix thoroughly for 2-3 minutes. Allow 5-minute slaking time, then remix briefly. Avoid adding water to an already-mixed batch; remix instead.
9. How do I prevent tiles from slipping on vertical surfaces with T20?
T20's non-skid properties help, but proper application is key: Apply thick ridges with the notched trowel, press firmly, and consider using support props for heavy marble/stone tiles. Allow adhesive to partially set (2-3 hours) before installing heavy tiles. Don't slide tiles on the adhesive‚Äîpress and twist to set. Using slightly thicker adhesive consistency helps on vertical surfaces.
10. What grout should I pair with T20 adhesive?
Roff offers compatible white grouts (Roff Epoxy Grout, Roff Cement-Based Grout in white). For marble and light tiles, white grout complements the aesthetic. For glass tiles, epoxy grout provides superior water resistance. Wait 48-72 hours before grouting (depending on humidity) to ensure adhesive has adequate set strength.
11. Why is T20 more expensive than other adhesives?
The ‚Çπ87 premium over T03 reflects superior engineering: higher polymer modification, extended open time, reduced slip on vertical surfaces, and enhanced flexibility for large format tiles. In premium projects (marble cladding, glass installations), T20's guaranteed professional finish justifies the cost difference. The extended workability also reduces installation errors and rework, offsetting the premium through labor efficiency.
12. Is T20 available in grey for aesthetic preference?
T20 Extrofix Ultra is formulated in white to leverage the premium aesthetic advantages. For large format tiles in grey, consider Roff T07 Extrofix (grey version) or T03 VFA (grey). However, grey is not recommended for marble, glass, or light tiles due to visible shadow marks. White is the superior choice for premium applications.

product_details.description_text:
Product Highlights
For fixing tiles & natural stone on interior & exterior floors & walls
Polymer modified | Bonds with various substrates
Water & shock resistant
Single component - just add water
Coverage:
Approx. 55-60 Sq ft per 20 kg bag
Packaging Size:
20 Kg
Proportion:
Approximately 1 bag of LATICRETE¬Æ 325 High Flex with 5-6 litres of water. Adjust quantity of liquid to obtain proper consistency.
Packaging Type:
Powder
Colour:
White
Product Description
MYK Laticrete 325 High Flex is a high-strength, polymer-modified thin-set adhesive designed for versatile tile and natural stone installations on floors and walls for both interior and exterior spaces.
This premium adhesive is water-resistant, shock-resistant, heat and freeze-thaw resistant, ensuring durable bonds even in demanding conditions such as swimming pools, balconies, terraces, and wet zones. It accommodates substrate movements and thermal expansions, providing excellent flexibility and bond integrity.
The powder mixes easily with water to form a creamy, thixotropic consistency allowing smooth application and full tile contact. It meets ANSI A118.4 ET, EN 12004/ISO 13007 C2TES1, and IS 15477:2019 Type 3 adhesive standards with a low VOC EC1 Plus rating.
Ideal for installing ceramic, vitrified, glass mosaic, and natural stone tiles, including large-format and slim tiles. Compatible with various substrates such as concrete, cement screeds, gypsum and plasterboard, existing tiles, and metal substrates (with suitable priming).
Recommended mixing ratio is 5.5 to 6 litres of water per 20 kg bag depending on desired consistency and environmental conditions. Use appropriate notched trowel for application.

Manufacturer:
Asian Paints (India's Leading Paint Brand)

Resists household stains and enables easy cleaning

Product Description
Asian Paints Premium Emulsion
is designed for homeowners who want both luxury and practicality on their interior walls. Its advanced Stain Guard technology and fungus resistance make it the ideal choice for busy homes that demand easy cleaning and long-term beauty. The low VOC formula meets top green building standards, ensuring a safe and eco-friendly living space.
With its rich matte finish and extra deep colours, this paint transforms everyday spaces into elegant settings. Its robust film ensures lasting impression and superior coverage, even on challenging surfaces.
Technical Features:
Stain Resistance:
Guards against common stains, ideal for kitchens and children's rooms
Matte Finish:
Soft, sophisticated glow for modern interiors
Fungal Guard:
Resilient against monsoon and damp conditions
VOC Content:
Less than 50g/L - significantly below typical paint standards
Application:
Brush, roller, or spray; dries to touch within 30-45 minutes
Recoat Time:
4 hours for best results
Available in 1000+ Premium Colors
Choose from thousands of Asian Paints color shades, from subtle earthy beiges to vivid designer reds and premium whites ‚Äì all in the Premium Emulsion range.

Affordable Premium Smooth Matte Finish Water-Based Emulsion:
Asian Paints Tractor Emulsion delivers premium smooth matte finish at an affordable price point, making quality interior walls accessible to all. Formulated for durability with 120-140 sqft/litre coverage and dirt-resistant properties, this water-based emulsion provides refined, non-reflective aesthetics while concealing wall imperfections. With realistic 3-4 year lifespan and easy maintenance, available in convenient 1L to 20L sizes, Tractor Emulsion offers exceptional value for budget-conscious homeowners seeking professional results.

Product Description
Asian Paints Tractor Emulsion
gives you a smooth, modern finish at an unbeatable value. Its formulation ensures both good coverage and resilience, protecting your interiors from dirt, stains, and dullness. Tractor Emulsion's high opacity hides wall imperfections while keeping your home fresh and presentable between repaints.
The emulsion dries quickly and is ideal for rental properties, first-time painting, and quick home makeovers, delivering a premium look at an exceptionally low cost. Available in a full palette of over 1000 trending and classic colors.

Premium Water-Based Exterior Emulsion with Advanced Water Resistance:
Asian Paints Ace is a revolutionary water-based exterior emulsion paint featuring unique water resistance technology designed for optimal exterior wall protection and aesthetic appeal. With weather-resistant protection, anti-algal formula, superior adhesion, and smooth matte finish, Ace delivers superior performance to traditional cement paints with resistance to chalking, cracking, and weathering. Premium Nano-Block Dust Proof Exterior Emulsion with Extended Warranty:
Asian Paints Apex is a revolutionary water-based exterior emulsion featuring advanced Nano-Block dust proof technology with 6-year performance warranty, designed for superior exterior protection. With weatherproof technology, anti-algal and anti-fungal protection, superior color retention, high washability, and smooth luxurious finish, Apex delivers premium exterior aesthetics. The innovative dust proof technology prevents dust settling while resisting harsh weather and algal attacks, maintaining paint film integrity with 120-140 sqft/litre coverage and eco-friendly low VOC formulation.

represents the pinnacle of exterior wall protection technology, delivering unmatched durability with an industry-leading 8-year warranty. This premium exterior emulsion combines advanced weatherproofing with superior aesthetics, making it the preferred choice for luxury homes, commercial buildings, and high-end construction projects across India.
Engineered with cutting-edge polymer technology and advanced pigment systems, Apex Ultima provides exceptional resistance to India's challenging climate conditions while maintaining stunning color vibrancy. Its self-cleaning properties and anti-microbial protection ensure your investment remains beautiful and protected for years to come.
Advanced Technical Specifications:
Coverage Rate:
120-140 sqft per litre on prepared smooth surfaces
Film Durability:
8-year warranty period with proper surface preparation
Weather Resistance:
UV stable, rain resistant, thermal shock resistant
Finish Quality:
Premium smooth matte with superior color depth
Drying Time:
Touch dry 30-45 minutes, recoat after 4-6 hours
VOC Content:
<50g/L meeting international environmental standards
Application Temperature:
10¬∞C to 40¬∞C for optimal performance

product_details.description_text:
Product Highlights
Manufacturer:
Asian Paints
Premium Fiber Reinforced Waterproof Exterior Paint with Extended Warranty:
Asian Paints Apex Ultima Protek is a revolutionary fiber-reinforced exterior paint engineered to eliminate dampness, algae, cracks, color fading, and fungus from walls. Featuring advanced Lamination Guard and Fiber technology with exceptional 2mm crack bridging ability, rich sheen finish, and industry-leading 12-year performance warranty (topcoat) plus 10-year waterproofing warranty (basecoat), Apex Ultima Protek maintains vibrant walls through severe weather conditions. With dust-resistant formula, anti-algal protection, and 50-60 sqft/litre coverage, it represents the ultimate exterior paint solution for demanding climates.

Asian Paints (India's Ultimate Exterior Paint Technology)

12 years performance + 10 years waterproofing‚Äîunmatched in India
Product Description
Asian Paints Apex Ultima Protek
represents the absolute pinnacle of exterior wall protection technology, engineered for the most demanding environments and premium construction projects. This revolutionary paint system combines advanced Fiber Technology with Lamination Guard protection to deliver unprecedented durability and waterproofing performance.
Bid farewell to dampness, algae, cracks, color fading, and fungus forever. Apex Ultima Protek's breakthrough fiber-reinforced formula not only beautifies your walls with a rich, lustrous sheen but actively protects against structural damage by bridging cracks up to 2mm. This makes it the ultimate choice for luxury homes, commercial buildings, and structures exposed to extreme weather conditions.
Advanced Engineering Specifications:
Crack Bridging:
Up to 2mm structural crack protection with micro-fiber reinforcement
Coverage Rate:
50-60 sqft per litre due to premium formulation density
Film Performance:
12-year topcoat durability under extreme weather conditions
Waterproof System:
10-year basecoat waterproofing warranty with complete moisture barrier
Weather Resistance:
Tested against UV radiation, thermal shock, acid rain, and pollution
Finish Quality:
Rich sheen with superior color depth and vibrancy
Application:
Multi-layer system requiring basecoat and topcoat application
Available in 1000+ Premium Colors
Experience the full spectrum of Asian Paints' most exclusive color collection, specially formulated for Apex Ultima Protek's rich sheen finish. Every shade maintains exceptional vibrancy and fade resistance for over a decade.

products.product_title: Asian Paints SmartCare Damp Proof Advanced

product_details.description_text:
Product Highlights
Manufacturer:
Asian Paints
Premium Elastomeric Waterproof Coating:
Asian Paints SmartCare Damp Proof Advanced is the ultimate single-pack waterproofing solution for terraces and exterior walls, protecting your Bangalore home from persistent monsoon dampness and leaks. product_details.description_text:
Product Highlights
Manufacturer:
Asian Paints (Luxury Finish Specialist)
Base:
Water-based Luxury Emulsion
Coverage:
Approx 150 sqft per Litre of Royale Glitz Luxury Emulsion
Packaging:
Available in 1L, 4L, 10L, 20L
Color Options:
1000+ premium designer shades
Luxury Technology & Protection Features:
Teflon‚Ñ¢ Surface Protector:
Resists stubborn household stains, enabling effortless cleaning and lasting protection
Stain Repellent Technology:
Actively prevents buildup of marks and stains for easy wipe-off cleaning
Anti-Fungal / Anti-Bacterial:
Inhibits microbial growth for spotless, healthy walls (variant-specific)
Low VOC & Green Assure:
Minimal odor, eco-compliant, and safe for indoor environments
Soft Sheen Luxury Finish:
Delivers a signature glimmer effect and ultra-smooth wall feel
Crack-Free Performance:
Maintains film integrity and finish for many years
8-Year Warranty:
Manufacturer-backed protection for color retention and finish brilliance
Product Description
Asian Paints Royale Glitz Luxury Emulsion
represents the most exclusive blend of technology and luxury, delivering a dazzling finish and ultimate stain protection for the modern Indian home. Its Teflon‚Ñ¢-infused formula ensures your walls look pristine and beautiful for years, combining the best of beauty and durability. Enjoy healthy, odorless spaces with internationally certified low VOC. Royale Glitz is perfectly suited for stylish living rooms, bedrooms, feature walls, and all interior spaces demanding an awe-inspiring look.

Feature
Details
Finish
Dazzling soft-sheen, ultra-luxurious effect on every wall
Teflon‚Ñ¢ Protection
Genuine Teflon‚Ñ¢ technology shields against stains, oil, and dirt
Coverage
Upto 150 sqft/L per coat‚Äîideal for main & feature walls
Anti-Fungal/Bacterial
Protection from fungus, mold, and common household bacteria
Low VOC Certification
Minimal odor; globally compliant for indoor air quality
Warranty
8-year performance warranty (color, sheen, protection)
Where to Use & Key Advantages:
Living & Drawing Rooms:
Showcases luxury in high-visibility areas
Bedrooms, Dining, or Feature Walls:
Adds subtle glamour to accent spaces
Washable & Easy Maintenance:
Best-in-class for busy homes‚Äîsimply wipe and shine
Designer Palette:
Curated 1000+ colors for all architectural styles
Available in 1000+ Designer Colors
The Royale Glitz palette features top designer picks across neutrals, pastels, jewel tones and bold statement colors. Ask about the latest 2025 seasonal collections!

Premium Glass Fiber-Reinforced Waterproofing Membrane:
Asian Paints Smartcare Damp Proof Terracotta is a glass fiber-reinforced elastomeric liquid-applied waterproofing membrane that forms a thick, seamless, durable protective layer upon curing. Its distinctive terracotta aesthetic tint combines ultimate waterproofing with visual appeal for terraces and exterior walls. This water-based solution dries in 4-6 hours and comes backed by a 10-year manufacturer waterproofing warranty, protecting your Bangalore home from monsoon dampness and leaks.

products.product_title: Asian Paints Trucare Extension Pole for Painting Rollers, 3 Meter (10ft)

product_details.description_text:
Product Highlights
Manufacturer:
Asian Paints (Harris Brushes India Pvt Ltd)
Product Code:
1057HS54122
Brand:
Asian Paints Trucare
Professional Extension for High Ceiling Painting:
Asian Paints Trucare 3-meter telescopic extension pole reaches up to 10 feet, eliminating ladder use for safe, efficient wall and ceiling painting with any roller or brush.
Why Choose Asian Paints Trucare Extension Pole?
Trusted Brand Quality:
From Asian Paints, India's leading paint manufacturer
Extended Reach:
3-meter (10 feet) length tackles high walls and ceilings effortlessly
Durable Construction:
Stainless steel body ensures long-lasting professional use
Universal Compatibility:
Works with all Asian Paints roller handles and standard painting tools
Safety First:
Reduces ladder accidents and eliminates overhead stretching
Advanced Features & Specifications
Telescopic Design:
Adjustable length for different ceiling heights and applications
Stainless Steel Construction:
Corrosion-resistant body withstands paint solvents and weather exposure
Professional Grade:
Used by painters and contractors for commercial and residential projects
Ergonomic Operation:
Lightweight design reduces arm fatigue during extended painting sessions
Twist-Lock Mechanism:
Secure locking system maintains selected length during use
Standard Thread Fitting:
Compatible with universal roller frames and handles
Technical Specifications
Brand:
Asian Paints Trucare
Model:
Extension Pole 3 Meter
SKU:
1057HS54122
Length:
3 Meters (10 feet / 120 inches)
Material:
Stainless steel body
Type:
Telescopic extension pole
Finish:
Blue and yellow powder-coated
Thread Type:
Standard screw-fit for roller handles
Weight:
Lightweight for easy maneuverability
Compatibility:
All Asian Paints roller handles, 9" rollers, brushes
Country of Origin:
India
Ideal Applications
High Ceiling Painting:
Perfect for 10-12 foot ceilings in halls and foyers
Wall Painting:
Complete wall coverage without ladder repositioning
Exterior Painting:
Reach upper portions of exterior walls safely from ground level
Staircase Walls:
Paint difficult stairwell areas with extended reach
Commercial Projects:
Office buildings, hotels, and institutional painting
Residential Renovation:
DIY home improvement and interior painting
Key Benefits for Painters
Increased Productivity:
Cover more area faster without constant ladder movement
Reduced Physical Strain:
Eliminates overhead reaching and back bending
Enhanced Safety:
Minimizes ladder-related accidents and falls
Professional Finish:
Maintain consistent pressure and smooth strokes from ground level
Cost-Effective:
Reduces labor time on large painting projects
Versatile Tool:
Works with rollers, brushes, and other attachments
Usage Instructions
Step 1:
Attach your Asian Paints roller handle or brush securely to threaded end
Step 2:
Extend pole to desired length using twist-lock mechanism
Step 3:
Ensure locking mechanism is tight to prevent slipping during use
Step 4:
Load roller with paint and apply using smooth, even strokes
Step 5:
Adjust angle as needed for ceiling edges and corners
Step 6:
Clean pole after use and store in dry location
Professional Tip:
For optimal control, grip pole at comfortable height with both hands. Use smooth, overlapping strokes to avoid lap marks. For ceiling work, stand directly beneath area being painted for best pressure distribution.
Important:
Check locking mechanism before each use. Do not overextend beyond recommended length. Ensure roller attachment is secure to prevent accidents. Clean stainless steel body regularly to maintain corrosion resistance.
Care & Maintenance
Wipe down pole with damp cloth after each painting session
Remove paint splatters immediately to prevent buildup
Store in dry location to maintain stainless steel finish
Check thread connections periodically for wear
Lubricate locking mechanism if it becomes stiff
Returns & Exchange Policy
Return Within 24 Hours of delivery under the following conditions:
Damaged or defective product.
Wrong or missing product.
Product cannot be returned once used.
Refer to Refund Policy for details.

products.product_title: Dr. Fixit 101 Pidiproof LW+

product_details.description_text:
Product Highlights
Manufacturer:
Dr. Fixit (Pidilite Industries Ltd.)
Integral Waterproofing from Within
- Liquid admixture that makes concrete & plaster waterproof from the core, preventing future leaks and structural damage.
Primary Use:
Integral waterproofing additive for concrete, mortar & plaster
Key Function:
Makes new construction waterproof from the inside, preventing future leaks
Simple Dosage:
200ml per 50kg bag of cement - precise and economical
Wine Red Color:
Easy identification in liquid form for quality control
Reduces Permeability:
Blocks capillary pores that cause water seepage
Prevents Shrinkage Cracks:
Improves concrete cohesion and reduces crack formation
Enhances Workability:
Acts as plasticizing agent for better concrete mixing
Steel Protection:
Prevents reinforcement corrosion by making concrete denser
Multi-Size Availability:
Available in 1L, 5L & 20L packs
Product Description
Transform your construction project into a waterproof fortress with
Dr. Fixit 101 Pidiproof LW+
- the integral liquid waterproofing compound that works from within. Unlike surface coatings that can fail over time, this advanced admixture becomes part of your concrete and plaster matrix, creating permanent waterproof protection that lasts the lifetime of your structure.
Specially formulated with surface-active plasticizing agents, polymers, and waterproofing additives, Pidiproof LW+ transforms ordinary concrete into a cohesive, impermeable barrier. By reducing the formation of capillary pores and micro-cracks, it ensures that water cannot penetrate your structure - protecting both the concrete and the steel reinforcement within from moisture damage and corrosion.
Advanced Waterproofing Technology
Polymer Enhancement:
Advanced polymer system creates flexible, cohesive concrete matrix
Pore Structure Modification:
Reduces capillary porosity that causes water ingress
Plasticizing Action:
Improves workability without increasing water content
Segregation Prevention:
Maintains uniform concrete mix consistency
Hydration Optimization:
Enhances cement hydration for stronger, denser concrete
Ideal Applications
Basement Construction:
Underground structures requiring hydrostatic pressure resistance
Roof Slabs & Screeds:
Horizontal surfaces exposed to weather and standing water
Water Tanks:
Storage structures requiring complete water tightness
External Plastering:
Weather-resistant exterior wall finishes
Bathroom Construction:
Wet areas requiring moisture protection
Balconies & Terraces:
Exposed horizontal surfaces
Swimming Pool Construction:
Structures under constant water pressure
Retaining Walls:
Structures subject to soil moisture and hydrostatic pressure
Technical Specifications
Product Type:
Integral liquid waterproofing compound
Appearance:
Free-flowing liquid
Color:
Wine red for easy identification
Specific Gravity:
1.05-1.07 g/cc at 25¬∞C
pH Value:
9-13 (alkaline)
Non-Volatile Content:
13-15%
Recommended Dosage:
200ml per 50kg cement bag (0.4% by weight)
Setting Time:
Does not affect normal setting time (30-600 minutes)
Coverage:
1 liter treats 250kg cement (5 bags of 50kg each)
Storage:
2 years in sealed container in cool, dry place
Standards Compliance:
Meets IS:2645-2003 requirements
Key Performance Benefits
Corrosion Resistance:
Chloride-free formula protects steel reinforcement from rusting
Reduced Permeability:
Significantly decreases water absorption and penetration
Enhanced Durability:
Increases structure lifespan by preventing water damage
Improved Strength:
Maintains specified compressive strength while adding waterproofing
Crack Prevention:
Reduces shrinkage and thermal cracking
Better Workability:
Easier mixing, placing, and finishing of concrete
Professional Application Method
Step-by-Step Application:
Dry Mix Preparation:
Charge cement & aggregates to mixer, mix dry for 1-2 minutes
Water Addition:
Add 75-80% of mixing water, mix for 2-3 minutes
Additive Integration:
Mix 200ml LW+ into remaining water, then add to mixer
Final Mixing:
Mix for additional 2 minutes for uniform distribution
Placement:
Place concrete or apply plaster as per design requirements
Curing:
Follow standard curing practices for optimal results
Critical Application Guidelines
Never Add Directly:
Do not add LW+ directly to dry cement mix - always dilute in water first
Water-Cement Ratio:
Maintain optimal W/C ratio as per design specifications
Dosage Control:
Do not exceed recommended dosage - more is not better
Storage Conditions:
Keep container sealed and store in cool, dry place
Quality Control:
Use calibrated measuring equipment for precise dosage
Economic & Environmental Advantages
Cost-Effective:
Prevents expensive repairs and waterproofing retrofits
Long-Term Savings:
Eliminates recurring maintenance costs
Resource Efficiency:
Small dosage provides comprehensive protection
Reduced Waste:
Prevents structural damage that leads to demolition waste
Energy Savings:
Better building envelope performance
Why Choose Dr. Fixit Pidiproof LW+ for Bangalore Construction?
Perfect for Bangalore's Climate:
With our city experiencing intense monsoons and high groundwater levels, integral waterproofing is essential from day one of construction.
Monsoon Protection:
Built-in defense against 150+ mm daily rainfall
Groundwater Resistance:
Protects basements from rising water table
Temperature Stability:
Performs consistently through seasonal variations
Urban Environment:
Resists pollution and acid rain effects
Construction Quality:
Enhances overall structural integrity
üöÄ HomeRun Construction Advantage
Site Delivery:
Direct delivery to construction sites across Bangalore in 60 minutes
Technical Support:
Free consultation on dosage and application methods
Quality Assurance:
Genuine Dr. Fixit products with batch certificates
Returns & Exchange Policy
Return within 24 hours of delivery under the following conditions:
Damaged or defective product
Wrong or missing product
Product cannot be returned once used
Refer to Refund Policy for details

products.product_title: Dr. Fixit 201 Crack-X Paste

product_details.description_text:
Product Highlights
Manufacturer:
Dr. Fixit (Pidilite Industries Ltd.)
Ready-to-Use Fiber Reinforced Crack Filler
- Single-pack acrylic polymer paste for permanent repair of internal & external wall cracks up to 5mm width with superior adhesion and flexibility.
Application Area:
Internal & external plastered brick masonry wall cracks up to 5mm width
Fiber Reinforced:
Enhanced durability and strength with micro-fiber reinforcement
Excellent Adhesion:
Superior bonding to cementitious surfaces without primer
UV & Weather Resistant:
Excellent resistance to atmospheric conditions and UV exposure
Flexible Formulation:
Accommodates minor structural movements without cracking
Tintable:
Can be tinted using water-based stainers for color matching
Non-Toxic:
Safe, user-friendly, non-hazardous formulation
Coverage:
25-30 running meters/kg (for 5mm depth √ó 5mm width cracks)
Appearance:
White paste with visible reinforcing fibers
Pack Sizes:
500g, 1kg, and 5kg convenient packaging
Product Description
Eliminate unsightly wall cracks permanently with
Dr. Fixit 201 Crack-X Paste
- the professional-grade, fiber-reinforced acrylic crack filler that delivers lasting repair solutions for both interior and exterior surfaces. Engineered with premium weather-durable acrylic emulsion polymers, carefully selected graded fillers, light-fast pigments, and specialized additives, this ready-to-use flexible putty transforms cracked surfaces into smooth, durable walls.
Unlike temporary fillers that shrink and crack over time, Crack-X Paste's advanced polymer matrix with micro-fiber reinforcement creates a permanent seal that moves with your building structure. Its exceptional bonding properties eliminate the need for primers on most surfaces, while its water-resistant formulation prevents future moisture ingress through repaired cracks.
ASTM Certified Performance
ASTM C 834-91 Standard Compliance:
Meets rigorous international specifications for latex sealants used in exterior walls of buildings, ensuring consistent quality and performance standards.
Advanced Acrylic Technology
Polymer Matrix:
High-quality acrylic emulsion provides superior flexibility and adhesion
Micro-Fiber Reinforcement:
Synthetic fibers enhance tensile strength and crack bridging ability
Non-Sagging Formula:
Paste consistency prevents dripping during vertical application
Permanent Flexibility:
Maintains elasticity to accommodate thermal expansion/contraction
Low VOC Content:
Environmentally friendly water-based formulation
Light-Fast Pigments:
Prevents color fading under UV exposure
Comprehensive Application Areas
Interior Wall Cracks:
Living rooms, bedrooms, hallways, and common areas
Exterior Wall Repairs:
Facade cracks, boundary walls, and outdoor surfaces
Plastered Masonry:
Brick, block, and stone masonry with plaster finish
Structural Settlements:
Minor settlement cracks in non-load bearing walls
Thermal Cracks:
Expansion/contraction cracks in building envelope
Pre-Paint Preparation:
Crack sealing before painting for smooth finish
Maintenance Repairs:
Regular building maintenance and refurbishment
Heritage Restoration:
Gentle repair of cracks in historical structures
Technical Specifications
Product Type:
Single-component acrylic polymer crack filler paste
Base:
Weather-durable acrylic emulsion polymer
Appearance:
White viscous paste with visible reinforcing fibers
Consistency:
Thixotropic paste, non-sagging
Specific Gravity:
1.40 ¬± 0.02 g/cc at 25¬∞C
Non-Volatile Content:
>70% by weight
Maximum Crack Width:
Up to 5mm depth and width
Coverage Rate:
25-30 running meters per kg (5mm √ó 5mm crack profile)
Tack-Free Time:
30-40 minutes at 25¬∞C, 50% RH
Overcoating Time:
4-6 hours (putty/POP), 6-8 hours (painting)
Service Temperature:
-15¬∞C to +80¬∞C
Shelf Life:
24 months in original sealed containers
Standards Compliance:
ASTM C 834-91
Superior Performance Features
Permanent Crack Sealing:
Elastic polymers and micro-fibers provide long-lasting repair
Movement Accommodation:
Flexible formulation prevents re-cracking from minor movement
Water Resistance:
Prevents moisture ingress and protects substrates
Paintability:
Compatible with all polymer-based paints after 6-8 hours
Non-Staining:
Will not discolor adjacent surfaces or bleed through paint
Easy Application:
Applies smoothly with standard putty knife or spatula
Professional Application Method
Step-by-Step Application Process:
Surface Preparation:
Clean surface of dust, oil, grease, and loose particles
Crack Preparation:
Widen hairline cracks to minimum 3-5mm using scraper, creating V-groove
Surface Conditioning:
Remove existing POP/putty on interior walls until plaster is exposed
Moistening:
Dampen surface before application for optimal adhesion
Priming (Optional):
Apply diluted Crack-X Paste (1:1 with water) as primer if needed
Application:
Press paste firmly into crack using spatula, ensuring complete fill
Leveling:
Level with surrounding surface, avoid air bubbles or cavities
Curing:
Allow 4-6 hours drying time before subsequent coats
Coverage Calculator & Economics
Typical Coverage Examples:
500g Pack:
Covers 12-15 running meters of 5mm √ó 5mm cracks
1kg Pack:
Covers 25-30 running meters of 5mm √ó 5mm cracks
5kg Pack:
Covers 125-150 running meters of 5mm √ó 5mm cracks
Cost Per Meter:
Highly economical compared to re-plastering or painting
Labor Savings:
One-time application eliminates repeated repairs
Application Guidelines & Precautions
Crack Size Limitation:
Do not use for cracks exceeding 5mm width or depth
Structural Limitations:
Not suitable for structural cracks, expansion joints, or separation gaps
Substrate Compatibility:
Not for direct application on POP or painter's putty
Temperature Range:
Apply between 10¬∞C to 45¬∞C for optimal performance
Weather Conditions:
Avoid application during rain or extreme humidity
Storage:
Keep container tightly closed after use, store in cool, dry place
Why Choose Crack-X Paste for Bangalore Properties?
Perfect for Bangalore's Climate:
Our city's unique combination of monsoon moisture, temperature variations, and urban pollution creates challenging conditions for building materials.
Monsoon Protection:
Water-resistant formulation prevents moisture ingress during heavy rains
Temperature Stability:
Maintains flexibility through Bangalore's seasonal temperature swings
UV Resistance:
High-altitude UV protection prevents degradation and color fade
Pollution Resistance:
Formulated to withstand urban environmental challenges
Structural Movement:
Accommodates minor building settlements common in developing areas

Quality Assurance:
Genuine Dr. Fixit products with ASTM certification guarantee

Right pack size recommendation based on crack extent

60-minute delivery across Bangalore for urgent repairs

Detailed application guides and troubleshooting support

products.product_title: Dr. Fixit 301 Pidicrete URP SBR Latex

product_details.description_text:
Product Highlights
Manufacturer:
Dr. Fixit (Pidilite Industries Ltd.)
SBR Latex Universal Repair Polymer
- Modified styrene butadiene latex bonding agent for concrete repairs, waterproofing, and structural bonding with superior adhesion and flexibility.
Base Technology:
Modified styrene butadiene (SBR) latex polymer system
Multi-Purpose Applications:
Concrete repairs, waterproofing coatings, and bonding agent
Superior Bonding:
Bonds strongly to old & new concrete, masonry, and plasters
Shrinkage Control:
Reduces shrinkage and prevents cracking in repair mortars
Abrasion Resistance:
Improves surface hardness and prevents dust generation
Standards Certified:
Meets BS 6319 Part 2:1983 & ASTM C 190-85 requirements
Ready-to-Use:
Liquid consistency, no mixing required
Appearance:
Milky white, translucent, free-flowing liquid
Pack Sizes:
1kg and 5kg options
Comprehensive Application Coverage
Coverage Specifications:
Waterproofing Coating:
2.0 - 2.2 m¬≤/kg in 2 coats
Mortar Modifier:
6-7.5 kg per 50kg cement bag
Bonding Agent:
4.2 - 4.5 m¬≤/kg per coat
Product Description
Experience the ultimate in concrete repair and waterproofing technology with
Dr. Fixit 301 Pidicrete URP (Universal Repair Polymer)
- the professional-grade SBR latex bonding system that revolutionizes how you approach structural repairs and waterproofing challenges. Based on advanced modified styrene butadiene latex technology, this versatile liquid polymer transforms ordinary cement into high-performance repair mortars, waterproof coatings, and structural bonding agents.
Unlike conventional bonding agents, Pidicrete URP's sophisticated polymer chemistry creates a flexible, durable matrix that moves with your structure while providing exceptional adhesion to both old and new concrete surfaces. Its proven ability to reduce shrinkage, prevent cracking, and eliminate dust generation makes it the preferred choice for architects, contractors, and engineers across India's most demanding construction projects.
Advanced SBR Latex Technology
Polymer Type:
Carboxylated styrene butadiene copolymer emulsion
Solid Content:
44¬±1% ensuring high polymer concentration
Adhesion Strength:
>3.5 N/mm¬≤ (ASTM C882) - exceeds industry standards
Flexural Enhancement:
Significantly improves mortar flexibility and crack resistance
Hydrolysis Resistance:
Maintains performance under wet conditions
pH Range:
7.5-9.5 - compatible with all cement types
Comprehensive Application Areas
Concrete Structure Repairs:
Spalled concrete of floors, columns, beams, chajjas, slabs, and parapets
Waterproofing Applications:
Small roof terraces, sunken toilet areas, bathrooms, lift pits, and balconies
Structural Bonding:
New concrete to old concrete, masonry stonework, and plastering applications
Cladding Works:
Fixing/re-fixing of slip bricks, tiles, natural stone, and marble installations
External Rendering:
Weather-resistant and frost-resistant exterior finishes
Industrial Applications:
Liquid tanks, effluent tanks, car decks, and walkways
Specialized Coatings:
Undercoat for chemical-resistant floors and top rendering systems
Technical Specifications
Product Type:
Modified styrene butadiene latex emulsion
Base Chemistry:
Carboxylated styrene butadiene copolymer
Appearance:
Milky white, translucent liquid
Specific Gravity:
1.01 ¬± 0.02 kg/liter
pH Value:
7.5 - 9.5 (alkaline stable)
Solid Content:
44 ¬± 1% by weight
Viscosity:
Free-flowing liquid consistency
Pot Life:
Minimum 2 hours when mixed with cement (1:1.5 ratio)
Bond Strength:
>3.5 N/mm¬≤ (ASTM C882)
Water Permeability:
Nil at 5 bar pressure (EN 12390-8)
Compressive Strength:
>20 N/mm¬≤ at 28 days (ASTM C109)
Flexural Strength:
>4 N/mm¬≤ at 28 days (ASTM C348)
Adhesion to Concrete:
>0.5 N/mm¬≤ (ASTM D 7234)
Shelf Life:
24 months in original sealed containers
Standards Compliance:
BS 6319 Part 2:1983 & ASTM C 190-85
Multi-Application Performance Benefits
Enhanced Adhesion:
Superior bonding to concrete, masonry, stone, and cementitious surfaces
Crack Resistance:
Polymer modification prevents shrinkage cracking and thermal movement
Waterproof Barrier:
Creates impermeable membrane when used as coating system
Durability Enhancement:
Increases wear resistance under mechanical and traffic loads
Chemical Resistance:
Protects against chloride penetration and carbonation
Dust Elimination:
Hardens surface and prevents dusting of concrete floors
Professional Application Methods
1. As Waterproofing Coating:
Mix Ratio:
URP:Water:Cement = 1:4:8 (by weight)
Clean substrate thoroughly, remove loose particles and contaminants
Apply first coat: Mix ratio as above, brush apply uniformly
Allow 4-6 hours drying between coats
Apply second coat in cross direction for complete coverage
Cure for 24-48 hours with intermittent water spraying
2. As Bonding Agent:
Mix Ratio:
URP:Cement = 1:2 (by weight)
Prepare substrate surface by mechanical cleaning
Mix URP with cement to form creamy paste
Apply bonding coat with stiff brush in thin, uniform layer
Place repair mortar/concrete while bonding coat is still tacky
3. As Mortar Modifier:
Dosage:
6-7.5 kg URP per 50kg cement
Add URP to gauging water before mixing with cement and sand
Mix thoroughly for 3-5 minutes in mechanical mixer
Apply modified mortar within pot life (2 hours)
Maintain moist curing for optimal strength development
Economic & Performance Advantages
Cost-Effective Solution:
Single product serves multiple applications reducing inventory
Long-Term Durability:
Prevents costly re-repairs and maintenance cycles
Labor Efficiency:
Easy application reduces installation time and costs
Material Optimization:
Improves cement utilization and reduces waste
Performance Reliability:
Consistent results reduce project risks and warranty claims
Why Choose Pidicrete URP for Bangalore Construction?
Engineered for Indian Conditions:
Bangalore's unique climate challenges require professional-grade polymer solutions that perform consistently.
Monsoon Performance:
Waterproof coatings withstand 200mm+ daily rainfall intensity
Temperature Stability:
Maintains flexibility through 15-35¬∞C seasonal variations
Humidity Resistance:
SBR technology performs reliably in 80%+ humidity conditions
Structural Movement:
Accommodates building settlements common in developing areas
Pollution Resistance:
Protects against urban environmental degradation
Quality Assurance:
International standards ensure consistent performance

Competitive pricing for large construction projects

60-minute delivery across Bangalore construction sites

Manufacturer:
Pidilite
Waterproof Synthetic Resin Adhesive:
Fevicol Marine is a high-performance synthetic resin-based adhesive by Pidilite, formulated for woodwork where high water resistance is crucial. Boasting up to 5 days water resistance and 5 hours in boiling water, this glue sets in up to 5 hours, ensuring reliable bonds even on marine-grade plywood and in high-humidity areas. With its advanced resin formula, it is ideal for interior and exterior furniture and woodworking.

Pidilite
Premium Anti-Bubble Waterproof Laminate Adhesive:
Fevicol HI-PER is a specially designed new-age adhesive for premium, thick laminates (1mm & above) and veneer pasting. Its revolutionary anti-bubble formula drastically reduces the formation of bubbles in laminate work, providing superior bonding for thick laminates and wood/veneers, even in challenging interior or furniture projects. Its waterproof property and rapid 2-3 hour setting make this ideal for fast, durable results.

represents the pinnacle of electrical safety technology, engineered specifically for modern Indian construction requirements. This premium building wire combines Polycab's advanced flame-retardant compound with high-purity copper conductors to deliver uncompromised safety and performance in residential, commercial, and industrial applications.
Unlike standard PVC wires that emit toxic gases and dense smoke during fires, FRLS-H wires use halogen-free insulation that significantly reduces smoke generation while eliminating dangerous hydrogen halide gas emissions. Finolex Flamegard FR-LSH Wire
represents the pinnacle of electrical safety technology, engineered specifically for fire-prone environments and high-density buildings across Bangalore. This premium flame retardant low smoke halogen wire combines advanced fire safety with superior electrical performance, making it the ideal choice for modern homes, commercial buildings, and industrial applications where safety cannot be compromised.
Manufactured using state-of-the-art separate grinding and blending technology, Flamegard wires feature 99.97% pure electrolytic copper conductors encased in specially formulated FR-LSH grade PVC insulation. This advanced insulation dramatically reduces smoke emission by 50% and toxic gas generation by 75% compared to ordinary PVC wires, ensuring better visibility and safer evacuation during fire emergencies.

products.product_title: Schneider Acti9 Residual Current Circuit Breaker, RCCB

product_details.description_text:
Product Highlights
Manufacturer:
Schneider Electric (Global Leader in Electrical Safety)
Product Series:
Acti9 - Professional RCCB Range
Device Function:
RCCB (Residual Current Circuit Breaker)
Life-Saving Sensitivity:
30mA detection prevents electric shock in ‚â§40ms
Regulatory Compliance:
NBC (National Building Code) mandatory for wet areas
Professional Features:
Earth fault indication, test button, DIN rail mounting
Critical Applications:
Bathroom, kitchen, swimming pool, outdoor installations
Protection Scope:
Electric shock, fire hazard, equipment damage prevention
Product Description
‚ö° Life-Saving Technology: RCCB is NOT Optional
Electric Shock Prevention:
30mA sensitivity detects dangerous leakage before it can harm
Lightning-Fast Response:
Trips in ‚â§40ms - faster than human nerve response
Regulatory Mandatory:
NBC requires RCCB for bathrooms, wet areas, outdoor circuits
Insurance Compliance:
Reduces liability and may lower insurance premiums
Family Protection:
Essential safety for children, elderly, vulnerable family members
Schneider Electric Acti9 RCCB (Residual Current Circuit Breaker)
is a life-saving safety device that detects earth leakage currents as low as 30mA and disconnects the circuit in milliseconds to prevent electric shock, fire hazards, and equipment damage. This is not just another electrical component‚Äîit's a critical safety system that can mean the difference between life and death in electrical fault situations.
Unlike traditional MCBs that only protect against overcurrent, RCCB monitors current imbalance between live and neutral wires, instantly detecting when current "leaks" through unintended paths‚Äîincluding through human body contact with live parts. With Schneider's advanced French engineering, the Acti9 RCCB provides reliable protection mandated by safety codes and preferred by electrical professionals worldwide.
Why RCCB is Essential: Understanding Earth Leakage
üîç How Earth Leakage Occurs & Why It's Deadly
Insulation Failure:
Aging wires, moisture, heat damage conductor insulation
Equipment Faults:
Appliance internal faults create conductive paths to metal parts
Human Contact:
Touching live parts creates current path through body to ground
Water Ingress:
Moisture in electrical connections creates leakage paths
Installation Errors:
Poor connections, damaged cables during construction
Environmental Factors:
Rodents, corrosion, vibration damage over time
Critical Applications: Where RCCB Saves Lives
üè† Mandatory & Recommended RCCB Installations
MANDATORY - Bathroom Circuits:
Wet environment + electrical = lethal combination
MANDATORY - Swimming Pool:
Water + electricity requires immediate disconnection
MANDATORY - Outdoor Installations:
Weather exposure increases fault probability
RECOMMENDED - Kitchen Circuits:
Water exposure near electrical appliances
RECOMMENDED - Children's Areas:
Enhanced protection for curious kids
RECOMMENDED - Elderly Care:
Slower reflexes need faster electrical protection
COMMERCIAL - Workshop Areas:
Power tools + human contact = high risk
INDUSTRIAL - Medical Facilities:
Patient safety during electrical procedures
Professional Installation Features
üîß Schneider Acti9 Professional Features
Earth Fault Indication:
Red mechanical indicator shows fault occurrence
Unified Terminal Design:
Clear wiring indication prevents installation errors
DIN Rail Mounting:
Standard 35mm rail for easy panel integration
Captive Padlocking:
Security feature prevents unauthorized operation
Operating Temperature:
-5¬∞C to +40¬∞C suitable for Indian climate
IP20 Protection:
Panel-mount protection against finger contact
Commercial & Industrial Benefits
üè¢ Business Case for RCCB Installation
Employee Safety:
Prevent workplace electrical accidents and compensation claims
Equipment Protection:
Prevent costly equipment damage from earth faults
Downtime Reduction:
Early fault detection prevents system failures
Fire Prevention:
Reduce property damage risk from electrical faults
Productivity:
Fewer electrical interruptions, safer work environment
Reputation:
Safety-conscious company image attracts better talent
Real-World Safety Statistics
üìä Why Every Second Matters in Electrical Safety
Fatal Current:
30mA through heart for 30 seconds can be fatal
Nerve Response:
Human reflexes take 150-300ms to react
RCCB Response:
40ms trip time - 4x faster than human nerves
Accident Statistics:
70% electrical accidents occur in wet conditions
Child Safety:
Lower body resistance makes children more vulnerable
Elderly Risk:
Slower reflexes and medical conditions increase danger
Cost of Life:
No amount of money equals the value of human life

Product Description
Transform your kitchen and wardrobe experience with
Hettich Onsys 4447i Soft Close Hinges
‚Äì the perfect blend of German engineering excellence and affordable Indian manufacturing. These premium concealed hinges feature an
integrated Silent System
that ensures every cabinet door closes gently and quietly, eliminating annoying door slams while protecting your furniture investment.
üåü Why Choose Hettich Onsys Over Standard Hinges?
Silent operation:
Integrated soft-close mechanism works automatically from 35¬∞ closing angle

Functions perfectly in Indian climate conditions - no issues with heat or humidity

Tested for 40,000 opening/closing cycles with 10-year warranty

Clip-on design allows quick door removal for cleaning or adjustment
Professional finish:
Nickel-plated steel resists corrosion and maintains appearance
Value for money:
Premium German technology at economical Indian manufacturing prices
Understanding Crank Options for Your Cabinet Style
üîß Choose Your Crank Type
9281432 - 0 Crank (Full Overlay):
Door completely covers the cabinet face frame
Most common for modern kitchen cabinets
Provides maximum storage space
9281434 - 8 Crank (Half Overlay):
Door partially covers cabinet face frame
Ideal for double-door cabinets sharing a center partition
Balanced appearance with visible frame elements
9281436 - 16 Crank (Inset):
Door sits flush inside the cabinet opening
Traditional furniture style appearance
Requires precise measurements for proper fit
Perfect Applications for Hettich Onsys Hinges
‚úÖ Ideal For:
Kitchen cabinets:
Upper and lower cabinet doors, pantry units
Wardrobe doors:
Bedroom and walk-in closet applications
Bathroom vanities:
Moisture-resistant finish suitable for humid areas
Storage cupboards:
Living room, office, and utility room cabinets
Entertainment centers:
TV units and display cabinet doors
Modular furniture:
Any 15-24mm thick cabinet door applications
‚öôÔ∏è Installation Made Simple
What's Included:
2 Soft Close Hinges + 2 Mounting Plates (4-hole design) + 2 Cover Caps
Required Tools:
35mm Forstner bit, drill, screwdriver, measuring tape
Installation Time:
15-20 minutes per door for DIY installation
Professional Tip:
Pre-existing 35mm hinge holes can often be reused, making upgrades even easier!
Frequently Asked Questions
Can I install these on existing cabinet doors?
Yes! If your current doors have 35mm concealed hinge holes, these Onsys hinges are direct replacements. For new installations, you'll need to drill 35mm holes at 11.5mm depth.
What's the difference between Onsys and more expensive Hettich hinges?
Onsys offers the same soft-close technology as premium ranges but with Level 2 European certification vs Level 3. Perfect for residential use with 10-year warranty at a more affordable price point.
Will these work in my humid bathroom or kitchen?
Absolutely! The nickel-plated steel finish passes 120-hour salt spray corrosion testing. They're designed for Indian climate conditions and work reliably in humid environments.
How do I know which crank angle I need?
Measure how your door should sit relative to the cabinet frame. Full overlay (0 crank) is most common, covering the entire frame. Half overlay (8 crank) shows part of the frame, and inset (16 crank) sits flush inside the opening.
Can I adjust the doors after installation?
Yes! Onsys hinges feature 3-dimensional adjustment: overlay (+2/-2mm), depth (+2.5/-1.5mm), and height adjustment at the mounting plate. Perfect alignment is always achievable.
