product_details.description_text:
Product Highlights
Manufacturer:
Hettich (Germany)
Series:
KA 4532 (German Engineering)
Origin:
Designed in Germany, Made in Taiwan
Premium Features
Silent System Technology:
Integrated soft-close mechanism closes drawers quietly and gently
Heavy-Duty Capacity:
35 kg load capacity certified to EN 15338, Level 2 standards
Full Extension:
Complete drawer access with smooth ball bearing action
Quick Release Catch:
Easy separation of drawer from cabinet for cleaning and maintenance
Precision Engineering:
Hardened steel ball bearings in noise-absorbing plastic for years of maintenance-free operation
High Lateral Stability:
Precision control ensures smooth movement without wobbling
Corrosion Resistant:
Galvanized steel with blue passivation (zinc finish) for durability
10-Year Warranty:
Comprehensive replacement warranty from Hettich
Technical Specifications
Model Number:
KA 4532 Silent System
Weight Capacity:
35 kg per pair
Mechanism:
Silent System (Soft Close)
Extension Type:
Full Extension (100% drawer access)
Installation Width:
12.7mm (EB 12.7) - Standard European sizing
Material:
Galvanized Steel, Blue Passivated
Finish:
Zinc (Corrosion Resistant)
Installation Type:
Side Mounting (visible runner)
Certification:
EN 15338, Level 2 (European Standard)
Warranty:
10 Years Replacement Warranty
Set Contents:
1 Set = Left + Right Ball Bearing Runners (2 pieces)
Product Description
Why Choose Hettich KA 4532 German Telescopic Channel?
The
Hettich KA 4532
represents the pinnacle of German engineering in drawer hardware. As part of Hettich's premium KA series, this telescopic channel combines precision ball bearing technology with the innovative
Silent System
for virtually silent drawer operation.
Silent System Technology - The Heart of Quiet Operation
The integrated
Silent System soft-close mechanism
is what sets the KA 4532 apart from standard drawer channels. When you push a drawer closed, the Silent System gently catches it and pulls it into the fully closed position with cushioned, controlled motion. This eliminates slamming, reduces noise pollution in your home or office, and significantly extends the life of both the drawer and its contents.
Premium Ball Bearing Construction
Unlike cheaper roller-based systems, the KA 4532 uses
hardened steel ball bearings
enclosed in noise-absorbing plastic cages. This precision engineering delivers:
Smooth, effortless operation
even under full 35kg load
Years of maintenance-free service
- Hettich guarantees 10 years
High lateral stability
preventing drawer wobble or tilting
Quiet operation
throughout the entire drawer travel
Full Extension for Complete Access
The KA 4532 provides
100% full extension
, meaning you can access the entire drawer depth without obstruction. This is particularly valuable for:
Kitchen cabinets:
Easy access to items at the back of deep pantry drawers
Office furniture:
Complete visibility of file folders and supplies
Workshop storage:
Quick retrieval of tools and parts from deep drawers
Wardrobe installations:
Full access to clothing and accessories
Quick Release Mechanism for Easy Maintenance
The integrated
quick release catch
allows you to detach the drawer from the cabinet body in seconds‚Äîno tools required. Simply pull the drawer to full extension, press the release levers on both sides, and lift the drawer away. This makes cleaning, reorganizing, or servicing your drawers incredibly convenient.
Built for Heavy-Duty Applications
With a
35kg (77 lbs) load capacity
certified to European standard
EN 15338, Level 2
, the KA 4532 is engineered for demanding applications:
Kitchen pantry drawers:
Heavy pots, pans, and cookware
Workshop tool drawers:
Dense metal tools and equipment
Office file drawers:
Multiple reams of paper and binders
Deep wire basket installations:
Bulk storage in modular systems
Versatile Drawer Compatibility
The KA 4532 is designed for side mounting and works with:
Wooden drawers
with grooved, rebated, or loosely fitted bases
Deep wire basket systems
(fixing clamps required - order separately)
Custom drawer designs
meeting standard 12.7mm installation width
Corrosion-Resistant Finish
The
galvanized steel construction with blue passivation
(zinc finish) provides excellent corrosion resistance, making the KA 4532 suitable for humid environments like:
Kitchen cabinets (exposure to steam and moisture)
Bathroom vanities (high humidity areas)
Coastal regions (salt air exposure)
Commercial kitchens and food service
German Engineering, Trusted Worldwide
Hettich
has been a leader in furniture fittings since 1888. With headquarters in Kirchlengern, Germany, Hettich products are trusted by furniture manufacturers, contractors, and DIY enthusiasts worldwide for their reliability, precision, and innovation. The KA 4532 continues this tradition with cutting-edge Silent System technology and meticulous quality control.
Installation Made Easy
The KA 4532 features a two-stage mounting process:
Drawer mounting:
Screw the narrow runner component to the drawer side panels, ensuring the front edge is flush with the drawer front
Cabinet mounting:
Attach the wider runner component to the cabinet sides at the specified dimensions
Assembly:
Simply slide both runner parts together until you hear an audible click
All mounting screws are included. For optimal results, use Hettich's direct fixing screws or self-taping screws as specified in the installation guide.
10-Year Comprehensive Warranty
Hettich stands behind the KA 4532 with a
10-year replacement warranty
covering:
Functional defects in materials or workmanship
Silent System mechanism failure
Ball bearing wear under normal use conditions
Structural integrity of runner components
Warranty terms and conditions apply. Proper installation and usage within specified load capacity required.
Installation & Planning Guidelines
Minimum Cabinet Depth Requirements
To ensure proper installation and full extension capability, your cabinet must meet these minimum depth requirements:
Channel Length
Minimum Cabinet Depth
Actual Drawer Travel
300mm (12")
304mm (12 1/4")
290mm
350mm (14")
354mm (14 1/4")
340mm
400mm (16")
404mm (16 1/4")
390mm
450mm (18")
454mm (18 1/4")
440mm
500mm (20")
504mm (20 1/4")
490mm
Installation Width (Gap Between Drawer and Cabinet)
The KA 4532 requires
12.7mm clearance on each side
between the drawer side panel and the cabinet inner wall. This is the standard EB 12.7 installation width used across Hettich's telescopic channel range.
Recommended Screw Fixing Points
For maximum load capacity and stability, use all main fixing screw holes provided on the runners. The loading capacity of 35kg assumes proper attachment using:
Hettich direct fixing countersunk screws (6.0mm dia. √ó 14mm)
Or Hettich self-taping screws of specified size
Installed in cabinet material providing screw pull-out resistance > 1,000 N (per EN 320)
Drawer Base Panel Compatibility
The KA 4532 works with drawers featuring:
Grooved base panels:
Most common in traditional drawer construction
Rebated base panels:
Where the base sits in a routed channel
Loosely fitted base panels:
Flush or floating bases
Wire Basket Installation
For deep wire basket applications,
fixing clamps must be ordered separately
. The clamps provide secure attachment points between the wire basket frame and the telescopic channel runners.

Superior Silent System technology

German design and engineering standards

Residential Applications
Modular Kitchen Cabinets:
Pantry drawers, cutlery organizers, spice pullouts
Bedroom Wardrobes:

Key Benefits of Hettich KA 4532
Silent Operation
Integrated Silent System eliminates drawer slamming, creating a peaceful home environment and protecting drawer contents from impact damage.
Heavy-Duty Strength
35kg load capacity handles the heaviest drawers‚Äîperfect for kitchenware, tools, office supplies, and bulk storage needs.
Full Access Design
100% full extension provides complete drawer visibility and easy access to items stored at the very back‚Äîno more reaching blindly.
Quick Disconnect
Tool-free release mechanism lets you remove drawers in seconds for cleaning, reorganizing, or seasonal storage rotation.
Corrosion Protection
Zinc-passivated galvanized steel resists rust and corrosion even in humid kitchens, bathrooms, and coastal environments.
10-Year Warranty
Hettich's comprehensive replacement warranty demonstrates their confidence in German engineering quality and long-term reliability.

Frequently Asked Questions
Q: What's the difference between Hettich KA 4532 German and KA 4732 Indian soft close?
A:
The KA 4532 (German design, Taiwan manufactured) features Hettich's advanced Silent System with superior soft-close dampening and quieter operation. The KA 4732 (India manufactured) has a simpler soft-close mechanism and slightly lower manufacturing tolerances. The KA 4532 is preferred for premium installations where silent operation is critical.
Q: Which length should I order for my kitchen drawer?
A:
Measure the internal depth of your cabinet (back to front). Order a channel length that is 4-10mm shorter than your cabinet depth. For example, a 404mm deep cabinet requires a 400mm channel. The channel provides full extension equal to its nominal length.
Q: Can I use KA 4532 for wire basket drawers?
A:
Yes! The KA 4532 is excellent for deep wire basket installations. However, you'll need to purchase
fixing clamps separately
to attach the wire basket frame to the channel runners. These clamps are not included in the standard set.
Q: What is the gap required between drawer and cabinet for installation?
A:
The KA 4532 requires
12.7mm clearance on each side
(25.4mm total). This is the standard EB 12.7 installation width. So if your cabinet opening is 500mm wide, your drawer external width should be 474.6mm (500mm - 25.4mm).
Q: How much weight can one set of KA 4532 channels hold?
A:
Each set (left + right runners) is rated for
35kg total load
, which includes the weight of the drawer itself plus contents. This is certified to European standard EN 15338, Level 2. For optimal performance, distribute weight evenly across the drawer.
Q: Is the soft-close mechanism adjustable?
A:
The Silent System soft-close is pre-calibrated at the factory and does not require adjustment. It's designed to provide consistent, reliable soft-closing action throughout the 10-year warranty period.
Q: Can I install KA 4532 channels myself, or do I need a professional?
A:
DIY installation is possible if you're comfortable with basic woodworking and have proper tools (drill, screwdriver, measuring tape, level). Hettich provides detailed installation instructions. However, for best results‚Äîespecially in visible applications‚Äîprofessional installation is recommended to ensure perfect alignment and smooth operation.
Q: What's included in one set?
A:
Each set includes: Left channel runner, Right channel runner, Mounting screws, Installation instructions. You receive everything needed to install one drawer (both sides).
Q: Does HomeRun deliver Hettich channels across all of Bangalore?
A:
Yes! We provide
60-minute delivery
to all serviceable areas of Bangalore. Simply add to cart, checkout, and your Hettich channels will arrive at your doorstep within the hour.

Effortless Overhead Cabinet Access:
EBCO Pro Lift hydraulic gas pump provides smooth, controlled lift-up mechanism for kitchen overhead cabinets with 200N force and 20Kg capacity for safe, elegant operation.

Corrosion Resistant:

Universal Compatibility:
Works with wooden and aluminum cabinet doors
Complete Installation Kit:

Brand:
EBCO

PLC-20

Hydraulic Gas Pump Lift-Up System

200N (Newton)

20 Kg maximum

12 months manufacturer warranty

China

EBCO Private Limited, Mumbai
Ideal Applications
Overhead Kitchen Cabinets:
Wall-mounted upper cabinets in modular kitchens

High cabinets requiring easy lift-up access

Lift-up doors for microwave and appliance storage
Wardrobe Top Boxes:
Upper storage compartments in wardrobes

Restaurant and hotel cabinet installations

Laundry room and storage area overhead units
Installation & Usage Benefits
Effortless Opening:
Minimal force required to lift heavy cabinet doors
Safety Feature:
Controlled closing prevents finger injuries and door damage
Space Optimization:
Door opens upward, maximizing workspace below
Extended Lifespan:
Reduces wear on hinges and cabinet structure
Professional Appearance:
Clean, modern hardware enhances kitchen aesthetics

Sealed hydraulic system requires no lubrication
Package Contents
1 √ó Hydraulic Gas Pump Unit
(200N, 20Kg capacity)
Mounting Brackets
(Left and Right)
Installation Clips
for secure attachment
Fixing Screws
and hardware kit
Installation Instructions
with mounting guide
Installation Guidelines
Step 1:
Measure cabinet door weight (maximum 20Kg)
Step 2:
Mark mounting positions on cabinet frame and door
Step 3:
Attach bottom bracket to cabinet base using provided screws
Step 4:
Fix top bracket to cabinet door at marked position
Step 5:
Test opening and closing motion for smooth operation
Step 6:
Adjust bracket positions if needed for optimal performance
Professional Tip:
Use one set of gas pumps for cabinet doors up to 600mm width. For wider doors (600-900mm), install two sets for balanced lifting and optimal performance.
Important:
Do not exceed 20Kg weight capacity. Ensure proper installation by qualified professionals for warranty validity. Check door weight before purchase to select appropriate force rating.

High-security deadbolt lock system with 14-pin multi-row cylinder technology offering 100+ million key combinations, designed for enhanced protection against forced entry and lock picking in residential and commercial applications.

Kohinoor Sink Waste PVC Pipe 32mm
represents the pinnacle of flexible drainage technology, combining advanced pull-type design with premium PVC construction. This professional-grade waste pipe delivers superior water management performance while providing exceptional installation flexibility for kitchen sinks, wash basins, and utility applications.
Whether upgrading residential kitchen drainage, installing commercial washroom systems, or enhancing utility area water management, this Kohinoor flexible waste pipe provides the perfect balance of functionality, durability, and installation ease. The brass nut connections and pull-type design ensure optimal performance and professional appearance.
Flexible Waste Pipe System Analysis
Kohinoor Pull-Type:
Features a pull-type expandable design, premium grade PVC, brass nut fittings, a 750mm expandable range, 40 years of Kohinoor experience, and multi-fixture compatibility.
Rigid Waste Pipe:
Has fixed length limitations, uses standard PVC materials, has plastic connections, a fixed pipe length, variable quality standards, and a limited usage scope.

This design accommodates varying distances, offers superior chemical resistance, enhanced corrosion resistance, universal installation compatibility, proven reliability and performance, and provides universal drainage solutions.

Professional Installation Process
‚öôÔ∏è Expert Installation Guidelines
Measurement Assessment:
Determine required pipe length and routing path for optimal installation
Pipe Preparation:
Extend or compress pipe to required length ensuring proper alignment
Thread Connection:
Apply PTFE tape to brass nut threads for enhanced sealing
Basin Connection:
Secure upper connection to basin waste outlet with appropriate torque
P-Trap Connection:
Connect lower end to P-trap or drainage system with brass nut

Ensure proper pipe routing without kinks or excessive bending
Leak Testing:
Verify connection integrity with water flow test under normal pressure

Optimize pipe position for accessibility and aesthetic appearance

.

Philips Ultra Glow 3-in-1 LED Downlight (Round)
represents the pinnacle of recessed lighting innovation, combining three distinct color temperatures in a single ultra-slim fixture designed specifically for false ceiling applications. This revolutionary downlight series from Philips Prime Plus collection transforms how you illuminate your spaces, offering unprecedented flexibility through simple scene switching technology.
Perfect for modern homes and commercial spaces with POP, gypsum, or metal grid false ceilings, the Ultra Glow 3-in-1 eliminates the need for multiple fixture types while providing superior light quality through advanced EyeComfort technology. With its sleek recessed design and professional-grade performance, this downlight seamlessly integrates into any interior while delivering the reliable illumination that has made Philips the world's leading lighting brand.
Scene Switch Technology: Simplicity Redefined
üéõÔ∏è How Scene Switching Works
Step 1:
Install normally with standard wall switch - no special wiring needed
Step 2:
Switch OFF and ON within 2 seconds to activate color change
Step 3:
Color sequence: Cool White ‚Üí Natural White ‚Üí Warm White ‚Üí Cool White
Step 4:
Memory function remembers last used color after extended OFF period
Universal Compatibility:
Works with any standard switch, dimmer, or timer

products.product_title: Philips LED Strip Light Driver

product_details.description_text:
Product Highlights
Manufacturer:
Philips (Signify Innovations India Ltd) - Professional Power Solutions
Essential LED Component:
LED Strip Light Driver - Constant Voltage SMPS
Constant Voltage Technology:
Stable 12V/24V DC output for optimal LED strip performance
Premium Efficiency:
>85% efficiency, >0.95 power factor reduces operating costs
Installation Ready:
Multiple protection features for safe DIY and professional use
Product Description
‚ö° Essential Power Foundation for Every LED Strip
Critical Component:
Every LED strip installation requires a quality driver for safety and performance
Voltage Conversion:
Safely converts 220-240V AC mains to stable 12V/24V DC for LED strips
Current Regulation:
Maintains constant voltage preventing LED damage from power fluctuations
Safety Protection:
Multiple safeguards protect against electrical hazards and equipment damage
Philips Quality:
Professional-grade components ensure reliable operation and long service life
Philips LED Strip Light Driver
represents the critical foundation component that every LED strip installation depends on for safe, reliable, and efficient operation. This professional-grade constant voltage power supply converts standard 220-240V AC mains power to the stable 12V or 24V DC voltage required by LED strips, while providing essential protection features that safeguard both the LEDs and the electrical installation.
Whether you're installing under-cabinet accent lighting, creating stunning cove lighting effects, or implementing large-scale commercial LED strip installations, the quality of your power driver determines the performance, safety, and lifespan of the entire system. Philips drivers combine advanced SMPS technology with comprehensive safety certifications, delivering the professional reliability that makes the difference between a successful installation and costly failures.
Constant Voltage Technology Excellence
üîã Why Constant Voltage is Critical for LED Strips
Voltage Stability:
Maintains precise 12V or 24V output regardless of input fluctuations
LED Strip Compatibility:
LED strips require constant voltage, not constant current drivers
Parallel Connection:
Enables simple parallel wiring of multiple LED strip sections
Brightness Consistency:
Prevents voltage drops that cause dimming and uneven lighting
Lifespan Protection:
Stable voltage prevents LED degradation from voltage stress
Easy Installation:
Simpler wiring compared to constant current alternatives
Scalable Design:
Easy to expand installations by adding more strips in parallel
Professional Standard:
Industry standard for LED strip power supply applications
Professional Installation Requirements
üîß Critical Installation Steps
Load Calculation:
Total LED strip wattage + 20% safety margin determines driver size
Voltage Matching:
LED strip voltage (12V/24V) must exactly match driver output
Current Verification:
Driver amperage must exceed total LED strip current draw
Location Selection:
Well-ventilated, dry area away from heat sources
Wire Sizing:
Adequate gauge for current rating - 18 AWG minimum for 5A
Electrical Safety:
Turn off mains power before any connections
Connection Security:
Tight terminals prevent voltage drop and heat buildup
Testing Protocol:
Verify output voltage/current before connecting LED strips

Philips EvenGlow LED Strip Light 5m
represents the pinnacle of flexible lighting technology, combining ultra-high LED density with professional-grade construction to deliver uniform, brilliant illumination that transforms any space. With 120 LEDs per meter across a complete 5-meter length, this premium strip light provides the perfect solution for comprehensive lighting projects that demand both quality and coverage.
Whether creating stunning cove lighting effects, enhancing kitchen functionality with under-cabinet illumination, or adding sophisticated accent lighting to living spaces, the EvenGlow delivers consistent, flicker-free performance that maintains Philips' legendary reliability. The flexible design adapts to any architectural feature while the self-adhesive backing ensures professional installation results every time.
Complete 5-Meter Coverage Applications
Perfect Length for Professional Installations
Room Perimeter Lighting:
Complete coverage for 12x12 ft rooms with single strip
Kitchen Under-Cabinet:
Full coverage for standard L-shaped kitchen layouts
Cove Lighting Systems:
Continuous illumination for ceiling cove designs
Staircase Illumination:
Safety lighting for standard residential staircases
TV/Entertainment Center:
Complete backlighting for large wall-mounted displays
Bedroom Accent Lighting:
Behind headboard, under bed, or around ceiling perimeter
Commercial Display:
Retail shelving, product highlighting, showcase illumination
Architectural Features:
Crown molding, archways, columns, and design elements
LED Strip Driver Requirements
Essential Power Supply Information
Required Driver:
60W 5A 12V LED strip driver (sold separately)
Voltage Match:
Must use 12V DC output - 24V drivers will damage LEDs
Current Rating:
Minimum 5A capacity required for full 5-meter strip
Power Calculation:
33W strip + 20% safety margin = 40W minimum driver
Professional Installation:
Driver placement in ventilated area away from moisture
Connection Method:
Positive/negative DC connections with proper polarity
Extension Capability:
Single driver can power up to 10 meters with proper wiring
Dimming Options:
Compatible with 12V LED dimmer controllers
Quality Assurance & Technical Specifications
Professional Grade Standards
LED Quality:
High-grade 2835 SMD LEDs with consistent color temperature
PCB Construction:
Double-layer copper PCB for superior current distribution
Adhesive Quality:
3M-grade double-sided tape for permanent installation
Flexibility Rating:
Bendable to 10mm radius without LED damage
Operating Temperature:
-20¬∞C to 60¬∞C for various environmental conditions
Color Consistency:
¬±3-step MacAdam ellipse color matching
Lifespan Rating:
20,000+ hours L70 specification
Warranty Coverage:
2-year comprehensive Philips warranty
Troubleshooting & Maintenance
Professional Problem Solving
Dim or Dark Sections:
Check connections, voltage drop, or LED failure points
Flickering Operation:
Verify driver compatibility, loose connections, or power supply issues
Color Inconsistency:
Ensure single color temperature batch, avoid mixing different strips
Adhesive Failure:
Clean surface thoroughly, use additional mounting clips if needed
Overheating Issues:
Check driver ventilation, avoid exceeding current rating
Cutting Problems:
Cut only at designated marks, use proper reconnection methods
Uneven Brightness:
Address voltage drop with thicker wires or multiple power points
Premature Failure:
Verify genuine Philips product, proper installation practices

products.product_title: Supreme Duraprotector-xf Floor Protection Sheet

product_details.description_text:
Product Highlights
Manufacturer:
Supreme Industries Limited
Brand:
Supreme DURAPROTECTOR
Product Line:
DURAPROTECTOR-XF Cross-Laminated Film
Award-Winning Floor Protection Solution:
Supreme DURAPROTECTOR 400 sqft roll safeguards expensive marble, granite, tiles, and wooden floors from paint stains, scratches, and construction damage with 3-layer cushioned engineering.
Why Choose Supreme DURAPROTECTOR?
National Award Winner:
Recognized high-performance composite floor protection system
Triple-Layer Engineering:
Abrasion-resistant film + HDPE foam cushioning + non-slip base
Reusable & Cost-Effective:
Use multiple times, eliminates costly POP, paper, or cloth alternatives
Large Coverage:
400 sq ft roll covers extensive floor areas during construction
100% Waterproof:
Resists paint, oil, grease, and cleaning agents completely
Advanced Features & Specifications
3-Layer Composite Structure:
Layer 1 - High-strength cross-laminated film for abrasion resistance; Layer 2 - High-density polyethylene foam for cushioning; Layer 3 - Reinforced non-dusting, anti-slip film
Closed-Cell Technology:
Thousands of foam cells provide excellent impact absorption and pressure resistance
Easy Roll-Out Application:
Flexible design lays flat like carpet with minimal memory retention
Universal Protection:
Works on marble, granite, ceramic tiles, vinyl, wood, marbonite, and concrete
Anti-Slip Surface:
Textured base prevents shifting and creates safe work environment
Environment Friendly:
100% recyclable, non-toxic, non-fibrous material
Technical Specifications
Brand:
Supreme DURAPROTECTOR-XF
Coverage Area:
400 Square Feet per roll
Thickness:
2mm (High-density composite)
Width:
Typically 1.3 meters (4 feet)
Length:
Custom roll length for 400 sqft coverage
Material:
Cross-laminated HDPE film + High-density polyethylene foam
Color:
Blue (standard construction grade)
Pattern:
Plain with textured anti-slip base
Weight:
Lightweight for easy handling and transport
Fire Rating:
Fire retardant formulation
Water Resistance:
100% waterproof, closed-cell structure
Reusability:
Multiple uses across different project sites
Country of Origin:
Made in India
Ideal Applications
Interior Painting Projects:
Protects floors from paint drips, spills, and roller splatter
Renovation & Remodeling:
Shields existing flooring during construction work
Carpentry Work:
Prevents sawdust accumulation and tool scratches
Electrical & Plumbing:
Guards against debris and equipment damage
POP & Plastering:
Waterproof barrier against wet materials
Furniture Movement:
Cushions floors during heavy equipment relocation
Commercial Construction:
Large-scale coverage for offices, hotels, hospitals
Residential Projects:
Home renovation, apartment fit-outs
Superior Protection Against
Paint Stains:
Does not absorb paint, oil, or chemical spills
Scratches & Gouges:
High-impact cushioning prevents tool and equipment damage
Falling Debris:
Shock-absorbing foam layer protects from falling materials
Heavy Foot Traffic:
Durable surface withstands constant worker movement
Furniture Dragging:
Anti-abrasion top layer prevents surface scratches
Moisture & Spills:
Waterproof construction keeps floors completely dry
Key Benefits Over Traditional Methods
vs. POP (Plaster of Paris):
No skilled labor required, instant installation, easy removal
vs. Rosin Paper:
Waterproof, reusable, better cushioning, doesn't tear easily
vs. Plastic Sheets:
Anti-slip surface, breathable where needed, professional appearance
vs. Drop Cloths:
Complete coverage, stays in place, protects edges and corners
Cost Savings:
One-time investment, reusable across multiple projects
Installation Guidelines
Step 1:
Clean floor surface thoroughly, remove dust and debris
Step 2:
Unroll DURAPROTECTOR sheet across entire protected area
Step 3:
Cut to exact size using utility knife or scissors
Step 4:
Overlap sheets by 2-3 inches at seams for complete coverage
Step 5:
Tape seams with masking tape to prevent shifting
Step 6:
Extend protection up skirting boards and stairs as needed
Step 7:
After project completion, roll up, clean, and store for reuse
Maintenance & Reusability
Wipe clean with damp cloth after each use
Remove excess paint or debris while still wet
Store rolled up in dry location between projects
Inspect for tears or damage before reusing
Typical lifespan: 5-10 reuses depending on project conditions
Professional Tip:
For maximum protection on Italian marble or premium granite, use DURAPROTECTOR throughout entire project duration. The anti-slip surface ensures safe worker movement while preventing any accidental damage. Can be cut and shaped to fit around columns, staircases, and irregular spaces.
Important:
400 sqft roll is ideal for large homes, apartments, or commercial spaces. Calculate coverage area before ordering. For maximum durability, avoid dragging sharp metal tools directly on surface. Remove and clean periodically during long-duration projects.
Perfect For
Builders and contractors handling multiple projects
Interior designers overseeing renovation work
Homeowners undertaking DIY painting or remodeling
Property managers protecting tenant spaces
Painting contractors requiring professional-grade protection
Returns & Exchange Policy
Return Within 24 Hours of delivery under the following conditions:
Damaged or defective product.
Wrong or missing product.
Product cannot be returned once used.
Refer to Refund Policy for details.

Product Highlights
Manufacturer:
Pidilite
The World-Renowned Can With a Thousand Uses:
WD-40 Multi Purpose Spray is the legendary water displacement formula trusted by professionals and DIY enthusiasts worldwide for decades. Originally developed to displace moisture from space shuttle components, this versatile spray lubricates squeaky hinges, penetrates rust, protects metal from corrosion, cleans stubborn grime, and displaces water. The innovative Smart Straw design flips up for precision application in tight spaces or down for wide coverage, making it essential for households, workshops, automotive maintenance, and outdoor equipment care.
